title: How to structure your react application
description: Have you ever felt confused on how your react application should be structured so that its easy for other coders to read as well as it helps in optimising your application at the same time. This blog will help you go through step by step process on how to structure you react app.

title: Redux Toolkit â€“ Future of Redux
description: Redux is a very popular library for state management. But it become very tiresome to create and initialize the store, create the reducers and the corresponding action while maintaining them in separate folders. All these problems are fixed in the latest version of Redux called Redux Toolkit where all the reducers, actions and initial state are present in a single slice which makes it easy to manage.
